words.notes: 1st person singular present; infinitive form does not exist in Bulgarian
Bulgarian has no infinitive; verbs given in 1st person

words.pronunciation_hint: KASH-ta - ъ like unstressed 'a', щ = sht

words.notes: Neuter form; masculine: онзи; feminine: онази
Same word as 'much'; context determines meaning
Same word as hand in Bulgarian
Same word as foot in Bulgarian
Also means mountain in some contexts
